name: Let's Get Out! (Final Version)
description: You wake up in a very strange place. This maze that you see is unlike any other one that you've seen in real life. Regardless of what it is, your only objective is to escape out of this place fast! You are going insane the longer you stay, so better move quickly! Beware of your actions, because there are consequences throughout this dream state of yours. Whether you get out or not determines if you wake up from this coma. There are various locations for you to head to whether it is a prison cell, a stranger's house, or even going to a mushroom land that is full of greenery.
